origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EconomicAPI.get_main_indicators', 'description': 'This function retrieves the main economic indicators of a specified country.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'country', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The country for which the economic indicators are requested, e.g., USA, China.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'indicators', 'description': 'A list of main economic indicators including GDP, unemployment rate, etc.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EconomicAPI.get_main_indicators, 它的参数输入如下: 'country'是'USA'.
